description: Manages users on Apache CloudStack based clouds.

domain.description: Domain the user is related to.

last_name.description: Last name of the user. Required on C(state=present).

poll_async.description: Poll async jobs until job has finished.

api_url.description: URL of the CloudStack API e.g. https://cloud.example.com/client/api.

api_secret.description: Secret key of the CloudStack API.

first_name.description: First name of the user. Required on C(state=present).

api_region.description: Name of the ini section in the C(cloustack.ini) file.

api_key.description: API key of the CloudStack API.

state.description: State of the user. C(unlocked) is an alias for C(enabled).

account.description: Account the user will be created under. Required on C(state=present).

password.description: Password of the user to be created. Required on C(state=present). Only considered on creation and will not be updated if user exists.

email.description: Email of the user. Required on C(state=present).
